title: The most expensive digital cameras by average price
summary: France 's AREVA was one of the largest builders of The Camera in the world .
The company specialized in The power and renewable energy .
However , after its insolvency , AREVA sold most of its Camera to the French utility , EDF while The propulsion and research Camera were sold to Agence des participations de l'État .
gold: This graph displays the average price of various models of camera in order to illustrate the most expensive . Highest in average price is Cambo , followed by Memoto and Sigma . Hunten and Konica have the lowest average prices .
